resources.string: Justice For The Dynasty (Expedition)
Obtain Dynasty Shackles from Dynasty Shipyard Lieutenants and return them to Liberator Guo outside the Dynasty Shipyards In Ebonscale.
"Where is the injustice?"
You stand at the precipice of a critical operation for Ebonscale Reach. The people of Zhou Taiying's Dynasty have been betrayed by her turn to Corruption.
"What can I do?"
Zhou's Lieutenants in the Shipyard carry on them manacles they use to capture and contain anyone they come across. Rob them of these barbaric tools.
Taking these shackles away from the upper members of her court give adventurers and innocents a fighting chance in running from Taiying's terror.
These devices are truly the tools of an oppressor. On behalf of the people of the Dynasty, I thank you. We will melt these down and make something good of them.
Venture into the Dynasty Shipyard Expedition
You have done well for the innocents of the Shipyard. If I see the iron gauntlet clench around them again, I will be sure to hail you.
Collect {itemName} from {targetName}
Defeat Empress Zhou
Even timid animals are at risk of being turned into Corrupted weapons. But tigers... tigers are another matter entirely.
To Be Free
Free the baby tigers for Ma Xinyi.
The darling cubs who used to roam my area have disappeared. What if... they're being turned to Corruption as we speak?
"Fate can be cruel."
"I'd hate to think so, but that's a sad possibility."
Even if the babies make it out alive, I doubt their minds will be intact. The innocent animals. We must help them!
Those predators! These cubs are only their most recent victims. But imagine if we could free them allâ€¦
Free baby tigers in {POITags}
Gather {itemName} to unlock tiger cages
Open Baby Tiger cages
The little ones roar their thanks. You have my gratitude, along with this humble reward.
It warms my heart to see the precious creatures roaming freely again. You did a noble thing, adventurer.
WANTED: IVAN THE INEVITABLE
(The board is now empty, free of wanted postings.)
Life went by so quickly when I had adventure in me. Now, all I can do is watch the leaves fall from the Ironwoods.
Scourging The Scourge
Defeat Ivan The Scourge for Elder Danya.
WANTED by Order of Elder Danya: IVAN THE SCOURGE, Grave-Robber, now Lost Behemoth and Utter Nuisance, must be eliminated.
"Utter Nuisance, hmm..."
"Ivan sounds like a menace. I'll look into this when I'm in the area."
WANTED by Order of Elder Danya: IVAN THE SCOURGE, Grave-Robber, now Lost Behemoth and Utter Nuisance, must be eliminated.
WANTED by Order of Elder Danya: IVAN THE SCOURGE, Grave-Robber, now Lost Behemoth and Utter Nuisance, must be eliminated.
Defeat {targetName}
Ah! You've done us all a service. The reprobate made a habit of robbing graves before he lost his soul.
Flowers for the Departed
Place the flowers at Skysong Crypt to check if Elder Danya's comrades have found peace.
Would you place these flowers at the altar and hear if they tell of my comrades' salvation?
"The flowers will speak?"
"What do you mean? I know of no flowers that can do such a thing."
It's an ancient rite. Put a flower on a gravestone and if it blossoms there, the soul underneath lies peacefully.
Have you placed the flowers at the crypt?
Take the flowers to {POITags}
Place the flowers at the altar
Defeat Elder Danya's Friends
You're back at last! Did you place the flowers safely? Did they bloom? How are my friends? Tell me everything!
"Your friends attacked me."
"They are not resting, I'm afraidâ€¦ and I doubt they ever will."
That is sad news. They were good peopleâ€¦ Perhaps one day they'll have the quiet slumber they deserve.
I still think about my friends often. The best I can do for them is remember them fondly.
The Corrupted Streak
Defeat the group of Corrupted tigers for Ma Xinyi and end the cycle.
A Corrupted tiger returned to the area yesterday. I was happy, at first, because I thought she'd regained her senses.
"Did she come back for her cubs?"
"Could she have followed the scent of her children? Intending to be with them?"
Wishful thinking! The Corrupted forced her here to lure the cubs back to them. How do we break this cycle?
"By removing the tigers."
"The Corrupted will stop hunting tigers if there are fewer around to find."
That is true, but I will miss seeing them near hereâ€¦
Did you put the darlings to rest?
Drive off Corrupted Tigers at {POITags}
Collect {itemName} from tigers
Defeat {targetName}
Tigers will always have a special place with meâ€¦
Sometimes doing the right thing hurts. I'll miss the tigers. What a shame this had to happenâ€¦
Do you think the Corrupted have their own culture or are they too barbaric?
The Mystery Within
Help Yue study the Corrupted nodule at Imperial Army Campsite.
Can you see that pustulous ball? The Corrupted have been guarding it watchfully for some time now. I wonder whyâ€¦
"Why don't you take a closer look?"
"Whatever it is will be hard to study from this distance. You'll discover a lot more about it if you get closer."
I have no desire to get closer to Corrupted slime. But perhaps you could examine it? I have a few coins that I can offer.
So, what do the Corrupted see in that that nodule?
Examine the Corruted nodule at {POITags}
Destroy the nodule
Ah, wonderful! Time to study this stone and understand how the Corrupted thinkâ€¦
Treasured Trinkets
Recover Chinese heirlooms from the Corrupted and give them to Yue so she can discover more about her past.
You know what infuriates me about the Corrupted? They raid and take whatever they want.
"Didn't we do just that?"
"It's not like we're innocent. We broke their nodule and took their stone, remember?"
Not even close. The Corrupted take over our land, our people and now our memories. Why'd they need those artifacts, anyway?
"So it isn't their creation?"
"It sounds like your idea of their having a culture isn't true then. That stone was merely stolen?"
The Empress brought that, and other artifacts, from the mainland. MY land! We really need to recover them. It's OUR history.
Any luck with the artifacts? Or are the Corrupted impossible to overcome?
Go to {POITags}
Collect Heirlooms for Yue
Go to {POITags}
Collect Heirlooms for Yue
I was an infant when I got here, and I know nothing of my old home â€” except from stories. This will help me learn of it!
These clay relics show the value my ancestors placed on beauty and simplicity. I'll do my best to perserve their feelings!
It's a blessing we can't get more wee ones on this island. I have two. Two barrels of misfortune I wouldn't wish on any sod.
Sins of the Brothers
Help Bardroy's sons, Bartolome and Bartholomew see sense and stop fighting each other.
The name's Bardroy Byrne. I'd introduce you to my sons, Bartolome and Bartholomew, but they are driving me mad.
"Families stir powerful emotions."
"That can happen. And brothers can be hot-tempered too. What did yours do?"
I don't even remember what they're fighting over, and I doubt they do either. Killed each other repeatedly! I've had it. Go knock sense into 'em.
I pray my boys are not too far gone. They may be addlepated idiots, but... they are mine.
Meet Bardroy's sons in {POITags}
Defeat {targetName}
Defeat {targetName}
Those reckless loons. My plan didn't work! They're still at each other's throats. But I'll find a way to make them see reasonâ€¦ despite this being Lost business.
I do treasure my boys, even if they've forgotten that they're family. I'll figure this out, you'll see.
Small cheer and great welcome makes a merry feast. And you've come to a bounteous meal indeed!
The Show Must Go On
Get black ink from Void Pitchers so Magistrate Redridge may complete her play about the Empress.
What a craven lot the Corrupted are, exploiting the weak to increase their numbers. We must arm the innocent against them!
"Is anyone without weapons today?"
"Don't they have weapons? I could train them to use the equipment in combat."
No, no, no, that's not the answer. We give the wide-eyed masses an idea. A belief. We are more than a community. We are a symbol against darkness!
"How can we show this to everyone?"
"Will the masses understand that lofty concept?"
Theatre educates! Imagine: the Life of Our Empress. A force in China and our guardian on Aeternum. If only I had the inkâ€¦
"What sort of ink do you need?"
"Do you have an ink in mind? Something specific to help your creativity flow?"
The black dye from the eponymous fungus that gives Ebonscale Reach its name. Nothing else will do for our Empress!
Pray tell, did you get that fungus yet? The theatre eagerly awaits your contribution!
Collect {itemName} from Void Pitchers around Ebonscale Reach
Splendid! With this, I can complete 'The Empress's Journey' â€” my script! For the Empress. And her people!
Keep fighting the good fight, dear patron of the arts. And, please, spread word of my magnificent production!
I designed our shrines by pushing the paradigm. You will notice each one makes you feel different based on its element.
Study In Green
Acquire Dryad Wood for Artificer Long to craft robust armor against the Corrupted.
Ah, you've met the Empress. Sufficiently impressed by her achievements, I'd assume.
"She does exhude confidence."
"The Empress carries the weight of her people's burdens and does so gracefully."
Everyone says the same. Yet where would she be without the throne she sits on, the shrines she commands? I built them all.
"She'd respond as needed, right?"
"The Dragon Throne is defined by the ruler, not the seat itself. I suppose she'd move again if necessary."
Why do I expect an amateur to see my genius? No matter. You seem capable, perhaps you can do the Empress a favor. I need Dryad Wood to craft her people armor.
Well? Don't you have the Dryad Wood yet? I am waiting.
Get Dryad Wood from {POITags}
Defeat Dryads to collect {itemName}
Oh, I was right about you! Capable indeed - not many make it back alive. This wood will do nicely... The Empress thanks you!
Ebonscale Reach needs everyone to play their part in the war against the Corrupted. I will craft. What will you do?
Family Puzzles
Return the puzzle box to Bardroy and discover the prize his sons were fighting to own.
I miss my oafsâ€¦ I discovered what they were fighting for before. Trying to inherit my puzzle box. And now that theyâ€™re Lostâ€¦ itâ€™s the last connection we share.
"What's in the box?"
"The box must be valuable for them to fight over it so. What does it contain?"
You helped me previously. I don't mind sharing whatâ€™s insideâ€¦ if you retrieve it. Deal? Still in some cargo the pirates filched from me long time back.
Did you find my puzzle box yet? You wouldn't be able to open it without me, mind. In case the greed got you tooâ€¦
Retrieve the puzzle box from {POITags}
Defeat {targetName} Pirates
Defeat {targetName} to Collect {itemName}
So, the contents of this box? Rum aged one-hundred years. A legend of the seas! Caramel. Smoky. As smooth as a lady's glove.
There are three worthy things in this life - guts, glory and rum. And the third is the sweetest.
Shrine Cleansing
Cleanse Skysong Shrine for Artificer Long.
My sources told me you burnt an incense for the Prince?
"No child should live like that."
"Zhou Liang has a tragic tale. Of course I'd help him."
Cure the abominable royal child while Corruption infects the land. My shrine needs cleansing and nobody offers to help!
"I will. How would I cleanse it?"
"Let me help. Is there some ritual or item I need to use to purify it?"
Burn this incense in the sanctum. My incense should drive away the evil spirits, including the Corrupted.
Sigh. I knew it. You really didn't intend to help me either, did you? My poor shrine wilts! From the inside out!
Talk to Yue
Is everything alright? I saw you talking to Artificer Longâ€¦ who is very animated today.
"She asked me for help."
"It is. Or it will be. She's worried about the shrines and nobody in the settlement seems to be helping her."
Ha. She lost the few friends she had by spouting nonsense against the Empress. I'd be wary of her if I were you.
"But she's making armor for all."
"I'd look at her deeds, not her words. She asked me for Dryad Wood in order to build defensive equipment for everyone."
What deeds? If you saw the armory, the citizens, you'd see how little she's actually crafted since the shrines fell.
Defeat {targetName}
Cleanse the Dragon Shrine
Cleanse the {POITags}
Defeat the Tiger
Collect {itemName} from chests
You saw the shrine overrun with all manner of Corrupted horrors? I was afraid of that. Without cleansing, the Corrupted must have taken it over.
The Corrupted tide will wash over Aeternum if we donâ€™t stop them.
Legacy Reclaimed
Collect Passenger Scrolls from the Corrupted for Yue to study.
After digging through a Corrupted campsite, I discovered there may still be artifacts on the ship that brought me here!
"You could learn about yourself."
"This shipwreck could contain important clues of your circumstances and how you arrived."
Exactly! Apparently, the cabin would have had a list of passengers. I may find other people who traveled with me!
"I can find that list."
"I know my way around a ship. I'll look for your list and bring it back."
You are very kind! The shipwreck is crawling with the Corrupted. Return safely. I'm starting to like you.
Could the other passengers tell me about my life in China? Oh! Don't let them be Corrupted or Lost!
Travel to {POITags}
Defeat Corrupted to Collect {itemName}
You did it! Please, let me see. Hmâ€¦ According to this, a perfumer called Muthalaly was on the same journey.
You are a good friend. Let's trounce these Corrupted together. And let me know if you see a Muthalaly?
My sweetheart is so beautiful, the moon and flowers feel embarrassed when compared to her.
The Red Claw
Collect a Crimson Paw from Redclaw for a red dye for Xiang Enlai.
I will spend the rest of my life with Yue. But first, I need to find the perfect red strings for her.
"Why does she want red strings?"
"Red strings are an unusual request. Do they have some significance?"
They're used in the Hair Combing ceremony. And that will protect us as a coupleâ€¦ if she'll have me.
"Isnâ€™t dying a string easier?"
"Dying a string shouldn't be too difficult. I could find some red flowers for you."
Yue is a romantic. She loves the idea of me fighting a Red Claw for the red stringâ€¦ but I can't do that alone.
You will keep the details of this task between us, correct? I want Yue to think I fought the Red Claw myself.
Seek the Redclaw at {POITags}
Defeat {targetName} for {itemName}
The Red Claw! Defeated? You're brave, like Yue. I hope she likes the red string and says 'yes'. Then we'll be married!
Ah, the things we do for love. I've known Yue since we were children. She's always wanted what she's wanted.
Serenity In Chaos
Destroy Corrupted forces at Serenity Monastery. Then report back to Artificer Long.
The Empress was more mother than ruler. The Corrupted multiplied with no one to rein them in. Thus we're here, in this mess.
"What have you been doing?"
"Regardless, where's the fine equipment you said you were crafting? What have you been doing all this time?"
Gathering intelligence for when the time is right to use it.
I hear there's going to be an important Corrupted meeting at a monastery, if youâ€™d care to disrupt it.
Did you disrupt the meeting, or were you too busy thinking about what I should and shouldn't have done?
Disrupt the Corrupted meeting at {POITags}
Defeat {targetName}
Defeat {targetName}
Defeat {targetName}
The Empress's mind was clouded. I can see that yours is much clearer. I do value everything you've done for me.
I trust Liang won't repeat the mistakes of his mother. Only time will tell if he deserves my support.
Strings of Fate
Retrieve red strings from Dynasty Corrupted for Xiang Enlai and Yue.
I'm sorry to disturb you, but our plan didn't work. A Red Paw doesn't make a red dye. Yue wants different red strings now.
"Veins from a Corruption Swarmer?"
"I suppose the danger must be sufficient, and the red strings magical enough to be considered romantic."
Not quite. Yue wants the red strings the Imperial Guards use for their armor. It is tangible fabric. Could you help me once again?
Once Yue and I are married, we'll spend our honeymoon in Everfall. I hear they have a never-ending banquet there.
Travel to {POITags}
Defeat Dynasty Corrupted for {itemName}
These are the perfect strings. I can't wait to show them to Yue. She'll say 'yes' to me now!
When Yue accepts, I'll be a very happy man. And when we get married, you'll be our guest of honor!
Revenge of a Playwright
Sabotage the Corrupted operations as payback for spoiling Redridge's play.
The Corrupted have dealt us a mighty blow by taking Empress Zhou Taiying. They've sabotaged my play and all it stood for!
"We should sabotage them in turn."
"Theatre goes only so far. Sometimes, we need to fight with more than just words."
Yesâ€¦ Yes! We've been gentle with the Corrupted for too long. Think therefore on revenge and cease to weep!
Let's teach the Corrupted it's NEVER a good idea to mess with the arts!
Sabotage the Corrupted at {POITags}
Collect {itemName} from chests
Collect {itemName} from Corrupted
Destroy Corrupted Scrolls
The Corrupted deserved everything you gave them and more. They will rue the day they hurt our Empress and my play!
Rehearsals of my new work 'Furious Fist' have begun. It's loosely based on what you've accomplished here in Ebonscale Reach.
The Empress needs all the allies she can get in these trying times.
Statuette Stash
Collect four Statuettes as told by handmaiden Zeng, to disrupt the Corrupted ritual.
I recovered a Corrupted dragon statue from the Wood Shrineâ€¦ and I fear this dark power within could be used to siphon souls.
"Siphoning souls! But from where?"
"How would that even work? And how do the shrines fit into this?"
Master Qi has said every soul that enters a temple leaves an imprint upon the place.
A temple is not only of stone, or wood, or other materials. The larger part is an unseen energy imbued by our souls.
"That energy shouldnâ€™t be misused."
"If the Corrupted found a way to tap into the power of souls, it would devastate Ebonscale Reach and beyond."
There is no precedent for interfering with such power, but the consequences of our inaction may be far worse.
Hurry and gather the other statues before it is too late. We can't let the Corrupted get a hold of such power!
Collect the {itemName} from the Metal Shrine
Collect the {itemName} from the Water Shrine
Collect the {itemName} from the Earth Shrine
Collect the {itemName} from the Fire Shrine
I'll store these statues carefully. We don't want them to break and unleash... whatever Corruption lies within.
Despite the dangers, I hope you can find some measure of peace and comfort in those shrines. They are beautiful.
End of Her Reign (Expedition)
Defeat Empress Zhou Taiying and her Captains. Then report back to Zeng Lingyun in the Ebonscale Settlement.
Poor Liang! To lose a mother and assume the Dragon Throne at the same time. All while our people suffer still...
"The Empress was loved."
"Everyone has suffered a terrible loss. Empress Zhou was a good ruler. She will be sorely missed."
I'd ask Liang for help, but his wounds are too fresh. Corrupted Empress Zhou besieges the docks with her 'loyal' handmaidens.
"Another mindless minion..."
"Then Corruption has eroded what little of her spirit remained. She is no longer the woman we once knew."
I beseech you to stop her. You'll need these statues to guide you; they now have a strange power over the Corrupted.
"The statues from the shrines!"
"Didn't we retrieve these statues from the shrines of the five elements? You told me they channel souls."
They will lure out powerful Corrupted, like our Empress. I served her for so many years. And now I... ask you to defeat her.
I will wish you good fortune. Empress Zhou Taiying was always formidable. Perhaps even more so now in her Corruptionâ€¦
Venture into the {POITags}
Defeat Empress Zhou
News of your valor has reached us! It was a sad thing to ask of youâ€¦ but I am grateful. The shipyards are safe. For nowâ€¦
Every day I teach Liang more about statecraft. But alas! Nothing can fill the void left by a mother.
Craving silk like the Empress wears? The royal silk is reserved for her, but I know how to get one just like it.
Magistrate Redridge needs to write a new play? I can share stories of my life with her... for a price.
The trick of the market is you need to buy low and sell high. There are gullible fools at both ends.
Admiring the tiles? Do you know each one is shaped on a wooden mold?
Long called them HER shrines? Ask her who created the tiles. Sure, she designed them but a team of us built them TOGETHER.
Yongtai will say she has 'silks as rich as those of the Empress' and then peddle her lower weaves to you. Don't be fooled.
You've got battle scars. You know the joy of pain! Give acupuncture a go. It opens up the muscles, makes you feel aliveâ€¦
Heard you helped Enlai get his red string. If you find an acupuncturist, the needles are on me!
One must not only look beautiful, one must smell beautiful. Appeal to all the senses of the observer. Like our Empress does.
You saw the ship? It brought me here with the Empress. I was selling perfumes in China, when she made me part of her retinue.
A few peasants sent their children with us. They hoped for better lives with the Empress, than at home. Could Yue be one?
Does Prince Liang really look like... a monster? I guess no one can have it all.
On the positive side, Prince Liang looks prettier. On the negative side, I'll have even less luck with the girls.
No Corrupted going in. No Corrupted going out. Ebonscale Reach is safe.
Guanyu is a turkey with his head in the dirt. The Corrupted have overrun the shrines, the roads, any camp they could find!
You know even if I die, I'll be reborn. So will you. I don't know what I'm guarding. The royal order? An accepted story?
We're honored to host you at the Three Perfections inn. There are many sights and many meals to enjoy here in Ebonscale!
Hello there! Are you new to Ebonscale Reach? Yes, I think so!
If you're the hunting type, you'll find Ebonscale has a variety of wildlife unlike anywhere else on Aeternum.
Keep lookin' at me like that and I'll make your jaw dance.
Always happy to see a fellow soldier-of-fortune. How can I help you, mate?
Always happy to see a fellow soldier-of-fortune. How can I help you, mate?\n\n[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Go on, sling your hook, big brain. I've had my fill of your kind.
Here to offer me salvation? I've got all the salvation I need in this here scabbard.
Well now, it's my honor to finally acknowledge the rising Champion in our ranks.\n\nMany have come forward to vouch for your valor, and now you are ready face the trial to become a Commander.

Well now, it's my honor to finally acknowledge the rising Champion in our ranks.

Many have come forward to vouch for your valor, and now you are ready face the trial to become a Commander.

[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
I salute you, Commander {playerName}. You are a paragon within our ranks.\n\nBack to the fight, then! Always, to the fight!

I salute you, Commander {playerName}. You are a paragon within our ranks.

Back to the fight, then! Always, to the fight!

[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Good day, stranger.
Seek forever farther, my scholar. In what manner may I oblige you?
Seek forever farther, my scholar. In what manner may I oblige you?\n\n[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
Ignorance is bold, knowledge is reserved. -Thucydides
Many, while doing the foulest deeds, use the fairest words. -Democritus
May the light protect you. Adjudicator Wen at your service.
I welcome you in service to the light. What is your bidding, fellow keeper.
I welcome you in service to the light. What is your bidding, fellow keeper.\n\n[ Level 49 required for Ebonscale Reach faction missions ]
You may not recognize it, Marauder, but the light watches over even you.
I respect your hunger for knowledge, researcher. But the most important is found within, not without.
I am here to loose the chains of all who would defy the Empress, for the good of the world.
My fighting prime may be long past, but I will never stop being Guo the Liberator. Wherever there is injustice, I appear.
